ARTICLE.AUTHOR: Anju
ARTICLE.HEADLINE: Miss Earth India apologises to Nepal for 'hurting sentiments
ARTICLE.BODY: Aaital Khosla, Miss Earth India, 2015, has apologised to Nepal for hurting the nation and its people, days after the controversial video that was uploaded as a part of the promotional campaign for Miss Earth International, 2015.

ARTICLE.AUTHOR: SAMJHANA
ARTICLE.HEADLINE: Russian air strikes kill at least 18 in northwest
ARTICLE.BODY: Air strikes believed to have been carried out by Russian jets killed at least 18 people and wounded dozens more in the town of Ariha in northwest Syria on Sunday, the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights reported.
